task.title: How to Send an Email?
task.shortdesc: Learn how to send an email using the Mail App.

taskbody.prereq: You are required to be logged in in order to use this feature. See the for more information.

context.p: You can send email to anyone using the Mail App. To do so, follow these steps.

step.cmd: Enter the email of the receiver/receivers.
Enter the subject of the email.

result.p: Your email is now sent. You can double check this in your "Sent" folder. To learn more about Mail organization see the page.

example.p: You want to send an email to "johndoe@email.com" asking them about their vacation.
Click the "New Mail" button. Enter "johndoe@email.com" in the first field. Enter the subject, for example,"Welcome back from your vacation!". Compose a message. Click the "Send" button.
